text: Belinda Bozzoli (17 December 1945 â€“ 5 December 2020) was a South African author, academic, sociologist, and politician. She was Shadow Minister of Higher Education, Science and Technology from 2019 to 2020. She also was a Member of Parliament (MP) for the Democratic Alliance from 2014 to 2020. Bozzoli died from cancer on 5 December 2020. ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1945 births Category:South African politicians Category:South African writers Category:Deaths from cancer
title: Belinda Bozzoli
